item.title: Kyra add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Whenever men and women straighten their backs up, they are going somewhere, because a man can't ride your back unless it is bent" -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Toni Morrison
item.description: "Freeing yourself was one thing, claiming ownership of that freed self was another." -- Toni Morrison

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Gloria Naylor
item.description: "Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over." -- Gloria Naylor

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Daphne duMaurier
item.description: "So you see, when war comes to one’s village, one’s doorstep, it isn’t tragic and impersonal any longer. It is just an excuse to vomit private hatred. That is why I am not a great patriot." -- Daphne duMaurier

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Thomas Paine
item.description: "It was needless, after this, to say that all was vanity and vexation of spirit; for it is impossible to derive happiness from the company of those whom we deprive of happiness. " -- Thomas Paine

item.title: Kyra add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "There are only the pursued, the pursuing, the busy and the tired." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "This is my letter to the world That never wrote to me" -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "You can't have intentions without consequences. The question is, who pays for the consequences? Saving fish from drowning. Same thing. Who’s saved? Who’s not?" -- Amy Tan

item.title: Kyra add a quote by HG Wells
item.description: "The man was running away with the rest, and selling his papers for a shilling each as he ran—a grotesque mingling of profit and panic." -- HG Wells

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "I would never have named them in the first place as they are not the ones I hold responsible. It's the organization that's to blame, the high officials are the ones to blame." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "for politics is in its essence as Adams had said the 'systematic organiztion of hatred': either you were organized or you were not" -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: Kyra add a quote by David Foster Wallace
item.description: "If you are bored and disgusted by politics and don't bother to vote, you are in effect voting for the entrenched Establishments of the two major parties, who please rest assured are not dumb, and who are keenly aware that it is in their interests to keep you disgusted and bored and cynical and to give you every possible reason to stay at home doing one-hitters and watching MTV on primary day. By all means stay home if you want, but don't bullshit yourself that you're not voting. In reality, there is <i>no such thing as not voting:</i> you either vote by voting, or you vote by staying home and tacitly doubling the value of some Diehard's vote." -- David Foster Wallace

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "The heavenly light you admire is fossil-light, it's the unfathomably distant past you gaze into, stars long extinct" -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: Kyra add a quote by James McBride
item.description: "The enemy was irony and truth and hypocrisy, that was the real enemy. That was the enemy that was killing him." -- James McBride

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Toni Morrison
item.description: "I welcomed the circling sharks but they avoided me as if knowing I preferred their teeth to the chains around my neck my waist my ankles" -- Toni Morrison

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Brian K. Vaughan
item.description: "They hurt you. You hurt 'em back. Or maybe it is the other way around. Whatever. Someday you might find a way to forgive each other. But it won't be like it used to 'cause that pain never really goes away." -- Brian K. Vaughan

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Gregory Maguire
item.description: "We start out in identical perfection: bright, reflective, full of sun. The accident of our lives bruises us into dirty individuality. We meet with grief. Our character dulls and tarnishes. We meet with guilt. We know, we know: the price of living is corruption. There isn’t as much light as there once was. In the grave we lapse back into undifferentiated sameness" -- Gregory Maguire

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Gloria Naylor
item.description: "But I don't believe that life is supposed to make you feel good, or to make you feel miserable either. Life is just supposed to make you feel." -- Gloria Naylor

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Gloria Naylor
item.description: "They all trying to say something with music that you can't say with plain talk. There ain't really no words for love or pain. And the way I see it, only fools go around trying to talk their love or talk their pain. So the smart people make music and you can kinda hear about it without them saying anything." -- Gloria Naylor

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Time passes. Even when it seems impossible. Even when each tick of the second hand aches like the pulse of blood behind a bruise. It passes unevenly, in strange lurches and dragging lulls, but pass it does. Even for me." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Walt Disney Company
item.description: "The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful of all." -- Walt Disney Company

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Lou Holtz
item.description: "Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it." -- Lou Holtz

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "We believe in ordinary acts of bravery, in the courage that drives one person to stand up for another." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Kyra add a quote by Walt Disney Company
item.description: "Around here, however, we don't look backwards for very long. We keep moving forward, opening up new doors and doing new things, because we're curious...and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths." -- Walt Disney Company
